Mad Libs is a popular word game where one player asks another to provide them with nouns, adjectives, verbs, and other types of words. These words are added to blank slots in a story. The result is a humorous, mixed up tale all players can enjoy reading aloud. To add to the fun, this app takes over the job of asking players for words so that both players can enjoy building a story together.

Within the game itself, Alibi features some menu options to help you manage your turn. To submit your word suggestion to the game, press Done. To stop playing the game and delete it from your list of ongoing games, press Cancel. To leave the game without suggesting a new word, press Leave. When you\'ve submitted enough words to complete your story, you and your partner will get the chance to see it. After you are done reading the story, select Done on the story menu, then Done in the game menu.
The game works best if you include supporting words such as the, a, or an with your word. E.G. The turkey, an orange, or a straw.
